channel.title: Authentication on Harvester manual test cases
channel.description: Recent content in Authentication on Harvester manual test cases

item.title: Authentication Validation
item.description: Enable Access Control . Choose “Allow any valid User” as “Site Access”. Make sure any user is able to access the site. Enable Access Control . Choose “Restrict to Specific User” and add few users. Make sure only the specified users have access to the server. Others should get authentication error. Enable Access Control . Choose “Restrict to Specific User” and add a group. Make sure only all users belonging to the group have access to the server Others should get authentication error.

item.title: First Time Login
item.description: After successful installation of Harvester using Iso, on navigating to UI, user should be prompted to change the password. Verify the password rules Expected Results User should be able to login

item.title: Login after password reset
item.description: Enter the wrong credential. Enter the correct credential Expected Results Login should fail. Login should pass

item.title: Logout from the UI and login again
item.description: Logout from the UI and Log in again Expected Results User should be able to logout/login successfully.

item.title: Multi-browser login
item.description: Login via Chrome, firefox, edge, safari etc Expected Results Chrome, firefox, edge, safari etc should have same behavior.

item.title: Verify SSH key was added from Github during install
item.description: Add ssh key from Github while installing the Harvester. Login Harvester with github. Expected Results User should be able to logout/login successfully.
